avdta.gui.util

Class ProjectChooser

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JFileChooser
            • avdta.gui.util.ProjectChooser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ProjectChooser
extends javax.swing.JFileChooser
    This class extends JFileChooser to specifically select Project folders. Project folders are denoted with a special icon (see ProjectFileView) even though they essentially behave as normal Windows folders.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:

      • accept

        public boolean accept(java.io.File file)
        Checks whether to accept the file as an openable Project. This calls ProjectFileView.isProject(java.io.File) and checks the output code. If setAcceptNone(boolean) is set to true, this accepts the file if the file is not a Project. If setAcceptAll(boolean) is set to true, this accepts any type of Project. Otherwise, this accepts Projects of the type specified in ProjectChooser(java.io.File, java.lang.String).
        Overrides:
        accept in class javax.swing.JFileChooser
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be checked
        Returns:
        whether the file can be opened

      • setAcceptAll

        public void setAcceptAll(boolean a)
        Updates whether to accept all types of Projects. If true, setAcceptNone(boolean) is set to false.
        Parameters:
        a - whether to accept all types of Projects

      • setAcceptNone

        public void setAcceptNone(boolean a)
        Updates whether to accept no Projects at all. If true, setAcceptAll(boolean) is set to false.
        Parameters:
        a - whether to accept no Projects
